overview: A man is sent to jail for murder escapes while being transferred, Rocky is sent to bring him in. When he catches him in a ghost town the man claims to be innocent and was trying to clear himself by finding the stolen money that was never recoveded at the time of the killing. But then they find themselves prisoners of an outlaw gang that is also after the money.
tagline: SMOKING SIX-GUNS SETTLE A SCORE!...as "Rocky" Blasts His Way Out Of A Killer's Trap!
title: Salt Lake Raiders
